= Linux =

Team Update
Build release
Copy planarity.exe and samples directory to ~user/bin
dos2unix samples directory
zip -r planarity.vNNN.linuxIntel.zip planarity.exe samples
Open zip file and remove any svn files
Unit test with "./planarity.exe -test"
Deprecate old Linux build
Upload new version
Add labels Type-Archive and OpSys-Linux
